0100110010110001 0110011001111101 0 -> sum: 1011001100101110, cout: 0
1111100111100111 1100111100001111 0 -> sum: 1100100011110110, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
